name: Unforgotten (itch)
description:
Unforgotten is a non-linear visual novel about mysticism, riddles, runes, rituals and a winter forest.

The game is based on the story of a small mining settlement hidden in the forest. In the center of events is a journalism student who wants to know the history of this place.

The non-linearity of history will allow you to find out a variety of secrets surrounding people who live here. The main thing is to find an approach.

A key feature of the visual novels genre is the opportunity to participate in events and influence to the plot. Each player’s action and decision can change the course of events. The most seemingly insignificant details can sometimes play a very important role. In Unforgotten you have to solve puzzles, conduct magic rituals and perform special tasks.
